name: UNNAMED HERO IN THE UNDERWORLD
description:
UNNAMED HERO IN THE UNDERWORLD is a 3D horror game with EGA graphics.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Shoot

E - Doors

STORY:

Hades, the god of the dead and the king of the underworld, is going mad. Monsters rise from the grave. The dark forces of the underworld are everywhere...

Unnamed hero, please, save Greece!

Game features:

- FPS inspired by Catacomb 3-D;

- old school EGA graphics;

- pixel art graphics;

- exciting four levels;

- epic boss fight;

- greek myths aesthetic;

- a lots of monsters;

- zombies =)

Built in Easy FPS Editor
